title: What's your favorite quote from a Champion?
body:
"I dealt it! It was me!" -Twitch

Literally the only reason I play twitch lol

replies.body: It's not from a champion...but my favorite quote in the game is "Oh no, TAKE your time, I'M ALREADY DEAD" [said by a Howling Abyss shopkeeper]. It pops into my head whenever I'm waiting for particularly slow people to move.
"A sword mirrors it's owner"{{champion:92}} You're right Riven, absolutely broken.
Diana's Jokes, whole reason I love her. "Knock, knock. Who's there? The moon . . . it's far away! You were alone the whole time! ha ha ha!"{{champion:131}}
{{champion:121}}  I ate an optimist once. but i couldn't keep him down. fking hilarious.
{{champion:91}} "only fools pledge their life to honor"
{{champion:74}} I dont agre with your methods but by golly do you get results
{{champion:18}} "is that a rocket In Your pocket" saying this to {{champion:17}}  is so fun as they are together.
